name: XCommentPro
tag_list: commenting, website-interactivity, user-generated-content, website-design, internet-marketing, commenting-software, paul-smithson, xsitepro, xheaderpro, complete-guide-to-traffic, web-page-content
overview:
Comment scripting software giving you control and functionality over adding interactivity to your web page content.

XCommentPro is a fully-featured piece of software designed from the ground-up to give you an unprecedented level of control and functionality over adding interactivity to your web page content.

User Generated Content is changing the way websites work… fact! Now, for the first time you too can add full commenting and interactivity to your web pages using XCommentPro. No more complicated coding or fiddly set-up routines!
